sentences.english: The brave young man voyaged single-handed in his yacht for months.

sentences.english: However, Longcheer Yacht Club has been always an independent brand which exists and will continually exist after VANKE purchased Longcheer.
sentences.chinese: 收購後的浪騎遊艇會仍作爲一個獨立品牌而存在。

sentences.english: Our house-boat is moored to a sandbank on the farther side of the river.

sentences.english: It's a similar story at Simpson Marine, a Hong Kong-based broker that also has offices in China.

sentences.english: The Binhai Boat Show 2011 is based on the theme of "Creating High-quality Life".

sentences.english: Cruise ships visit Ny Alesund throughout the summer, some small, some large.

sentences.english: Enthusiasts on a yachting forum questioned the wisdom of sailing in the area.

sentences.english: Alcatraz Cruises is the official carrier for tours to Alcatraz Island.

sentences.english: He rents out this 154-foot mega yacht called Mr. Terrible.

sentences.english: The houseboat on the banks of the Mississippi in which my great-grandmother lived.

sentences.english: This is actually a little bit bigger than some of the life boats and dinghies that you'd have in the U.
